segments.text: Sorry . I didn't mean to be late . Can I come in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have I used the one that my sister is sick ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure ? I thought I said it was my mother .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . But it could've been .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . You can trust me this time . My sister is definitely sick . I'm just coming from the hospital . They say she might even die .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't buy your story . Try not to have any more sick relatives this week , all right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just try to be a little more punctual in the future .
segments.speaker: S2
